title: Hour 1: HBCU Week!
description:
First Take hits the road to Orlando for HBCU Week! Stephen A. calls Russell Wilson the most disappointing QB this season. Ryan Clark says the Rams better watch out for the Cowboys this week. The two clash over the Ravens, and whether or not Lamar can carry them on a deep playoff run. Later on, Channing Crowder and Fred Taylor join the show, to discuss Tom Brady, Bobby Wagner being sued for tackling a protestor on the field, and DK Metcalf cart ride to the bathroom.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: Hour 1: HBCU Week!
